channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 17:27 The threat of use of the CI threat of use of managed aviation bombs
item.description: 🟠 17:27 The threat of use of the CI threat of use of managed aviation bombs This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
